caption.p: Observed epidemic cases and detected viral types. The weekly number of reported cases per sentinel is shown using bar plot. The number of A(H3)Hong Kong, A(H1N1)pdm09 and B cases are depicted using orange, grey, and yellow lines, respectively. The situations in Miyazaki city, Chuo, Miyakonojo, Nobeoka, Nichinan, Kobayashi, Takanabe, Takachiho, and Hyuga are shown in ( aâ€“ i), respectively.
